action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image on display is a pattern composed of pixelated blocks, each block representing a letter or a symbol. The arrangement includes a purple plus sign, large and central, and an F to its right. These are flanked by a yellow inverted 'J' to the left and a pink T to the right of the F. On the far right is a purple square, and at the top of the image is a teal bar across the width. The color palette is vibrant with a stark contrast to the white background, creating a visual impact akin to a modern digital or pixel art style.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image on display is a pattern composed of pixelated blocks, each block representing a letter or a symbol. The arrangement includes a purple plus sign, large and central, and an F to its right. These are flanked by a yellow inverted 'J' to the left and a pink T to the right of the F. Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.

Based on the description of my image and your description, the similarities in terms of color use and object assembly could imply a connection, but to confirm whether the images are identical or not, I have a question regarding the arrangement and possible color count in your image. 

QUESTION: Do any of the colored shapes in your image overlap? If so, what colors intersect, and in what configuration?
